summary: This mod add New Companion Mina
descriptionHtml:
This mod add New Companion Mina
HERE IS NO CLOTH!
You can find her in Solitude Whinking Skeever 
She trained in Blades
Install:
Simple setup all files from archive to your Data folder and Activate 
Uninstall: Delete ..esp and bsa
Requires : Apachii Sky Hair
Recomended : Better Females by Bella
Assuming you have the creation kit, open that up. 
Once you got the creation kit up, 
click the open folder box in the top left hand corner. 
Select the \"Skyrim.esm\"(don\'t make it active, just put the check mark by it), 
then select the Apachii.esm(also just put a check by it, don\'t make it active\". 
Then scroll down and find my mod and set that file as active, 
then click open. 

Once you\'ve done all of that, scroll down to the redguard, highlight my  npc in the list in the object (her name sne...53) window then press ctrl f4. 
It will bring up a dialogue box asking to export face gen data, select YES. After this, since there are so many files you\'re exporting it\'s going to take a minute(find something else to do while it finishes) 
and yes.. Your creation kit will hang, and seem to not respond, but only because it\'s working. 
When it\'s done it will bring up another dialogue box telling you it\'s done, click OK on that. 
Then do the very same thing for the Imperials. 
Once that\'s finished DO NOT CLOSE OUT THE CREATION KIT
Navigate to your skyrim folder. Go to Data\\Textures\\Actors\\Character\\FaceGenData\\Facetint\\Skyrim.esm, and delete ALL files from that folder. Close out of the window
Click save in the creation kit, then close out the creation kit.
author: Den987
